name: Root Rumble
description:
Submission for Global Game Jam 2023

A Root Based 1v1 Arcade Fighter

Controls

Player 1  Controls 

A - Left

D - right

W - Jump

S - Shield

F - Light Attack

G - Heavy Attack

Player 2 Controls

Left Arrow - Left

Right Arrow - Right

Up  Arrow - Jump

Down Arrow - Shield

M or Num 1 - Light Attack

Comma or Num 2 - Heavy Attack
